SongName: Counting Stars (feat. Chrissy Costanza & Kurt Schneider)
Lyric:
[00:02.24]Lately I been, I been losing sleep
[00:05.76]Dreaming about the things that we could be
[00:10.06]Baby, I been,
[00:12.13]I been prayin' hard
[00:14.67]Said no more counting dollars
[00:16.66]We'll be counting stars
[00:19.85]Yeah, we'll be counting stars
[00:30.42]I see this life
[00:31.80]Like a swinging vine
[00:32.88]Swing my heart across the line
[00:34.84]In my face is flashing signs
[00:37.06]Seek it out and ye shall find
[00:38.94]Old, but I'm not that old
[00:40.84]Young, but I'm not that bold
[00:42.82]I don't think the world is sold
[00:44.94]I'm just doing what we're told
[00:47.23]I feel something so right
[00:51.58]Doing the wrong thing
[00:55.31]And I feel something so wrong
[00:59.42]Doing the right thing
[01:02.82]I couldn't lie, couldn't lie, couldn't lie
[01:06.49]Everything that kills me makes me feel alive

[01:37.98]Hope is our four letter word
[01:39.88]Make that money
[01:40.83]Watch it burn
[01:41.86]Old, but I'm not that old
[01:43.83]Young, but I'm not that bold
[01:45.68]I don't think the world is sold
[01:47.85]I'm just doing what we're told
